page.title: 16Food
page.content: Questionaires were sent to the parents of the 368 pupils in Holbury school to collect data,the results of which appear on the following pages. The % of returns was{42%} We discovered after analysis: { 13%}shopped at small local shops {54%}used local supermarkets {25%}did not shop locally {8% }used a combination of all three {*********} We also discovered: { 80% }eat out at restaurants or pubs {********* { 28% }eat out once a month {21% }eat out 2-5 times a month {1% }eat out 6-10 times a month {1% }eat out 11-15 times a month {1% }eat out more than this. { { }
